title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Mathematics Instructional Design System Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of secondary-level mathematics knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Customized math competency enhancement program to improve job efficiency for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the logical structure of mathematical concepts with 80% accuracy using standardized pedagogical methods in mobile environments
Learners can complete two projects applying microlearning content developed through e-learning platforms to practical tasks
Learners can analyze and report their learning outcomes through three-tiered evaluations (self/peer/instructor) using peer feedback and e-assessment systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
